body:
Bumps [Markdig.Signed](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig) from 0.15.4 to 0.15.5.
Changelog *Sourced from [Markdig.Signed's changelog](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/blob/master/changelog.md).* > ## 0.15.5 (11 Dec 2018) > - Empty image alt text for link reference definitions ([(PR [#254](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/254))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/254)) > - Fix AutoLink Match links without slash after domain ([(PR [#260](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/260))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/260)) > - Make AutoLink ValidPreviousCharacters configurable ([(PR [#264](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/264))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/264)) > - Ensuring line breaks when renderer does not have html enabled ([(PR [#270](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/270))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/270)) >
Commits - [`cc47d33`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/cc47d33c7dc4480d7223bd7cffdb779b99fae16c) Bump version to 0.15.5 - [`fedbe2a`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/fedbe2adc5d35e698ecd94787060f74694471114) Merge pull request [#267](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/267) from redcrayonn/patch-1 - [`8efc082`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/8efc082d1da64685f619a4ab497be61ca124e482) Update typo in AutoIdentifierOptions - [`6c2702f`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/6c2702f9fd0a277881f06e881b044a849676f480) Merge pull request [#270](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/270) from neilha/master - [`4824f46`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/4824f460c059d0d22ac299ee40829c9574053965) fixes [#196](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/196) ensuring line breaks when renderer does not have html enabled - [`46fc840`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/46fc840c359a9d5b9cef6f625da19eab850b17b7) AutoIdentifierOptions clarification - [`ce3078d`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/ce3078dcf2bea32169431f9ce2eaa0039a19b62d) Merge pull request [#264](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/264) from MihaZupan/autolink-prev-chars - [`b8255a8`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/b8255a87cff9d7893d48f7670be76682afbf48fb) Make AutoLink ValidPreviousCharacters configurable - [`4f6ad47`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/4f6ad47c6a7cbc4b71bc1732f7bf5261f16916c1) Merge pull request [#255](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/255) from dampee/patch-1 - [`d6d6f9c`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d6d6f9c5c1770bdfcc0f225f6aa892d2da732345) Merge pull request [#256](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/256) from SyntaxC4/patch-1 - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/compare/v0.15.4...v0.15.5)

Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.
